suggestions.original: To improve the line texture in the artwork, consider adding more detailed line work to the brown pillars and the yellow animal. This could involve using finer lines to create texture and depth, making these elements stand out more. Additionally, varying the line thickness in these areas can help to enhance their definition. For example, using thinner lines for the fur of the yellow animal and adding more intricate details to the surface of the brown pillars can make the overall composition more dynamic and visually appealing.
